item.title: Still no reason to trust them.
item.description: https://kotaku.com/discord-palantir-peter-thiel-persona-age-verification-2000668951 Because of the controversies around Palantir, Discord is switching to Persona for their "Age verification experiment." As pointed out by @DJevelen, Persona is also linked to Peter Thiel, who is their primary investor. Discord already had a data breach, and lost over 70,000 user's personal data back in 2025. Discord has already lied to us three time minimum. #1 They said they will keep our data, which is being handed over to 3rd party. #2 They said they would delete the data once age has been verified, the former companies are both known to never deleting data. Now they are claiming it will only be held for "Seven Days." #3 They said they don't monitor private servers and chats, yet now they say they are using AI to read your private servers and chats to determine your age. This is about data, control, and money above all else. Removing another layer of anonymity from the internet. Infringing on our rights, the freedom of speech, and the ability speak out against the actions of our and other governments.
item.dc:creator: Imadethisaccounttopost

item.title: A visual display of how many times the president is mentioned in the Epstein files so far.
item.description: The caption on this is, "I’m a visual person. So I was curious and wanted to see what 38,000 mentions of the President’s name looks like in print. So here it is, set in 9 point type in a condensed typeface. The final result is almost 30 feet long. That’s how many times he’s mentioned in the files to date (with several million yet to be released). Gross." https://www.instagram.com/addnoisestudios

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @TarantulaBox crocheted this with beads! Crazy talented! Check out their other work in their posts and leave some love (trigger warning for spidey-bois though)
27 Man Tax: Enrique Iglesias
“Acceptance is right. Kindness is right. Love is right. I pray, right now, that we're moving into a kinder time when prejudice is overcome by understanding; when narrow-mindedness, and narrow-minded bigotry is overwhelmed by open-hearted empathy; when the pain of judgmentalism is replaced by the purity of love.” - Janet Jackson So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work, zero income. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've honestly been my lifeline. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me
item.dc:creator: MemeMuseumCurator

item.title: DHS Checklist
item.description: A particularly unflattering piece in the February 13 issue of the Wall Street Journal about Kristi Noem and her alleged FWB Corey Lewandowski relates a particularly absurd episode illustrating Noem’s diva-like behavior in running the Department of Homeland Security. “In the blanket incident, Noem had to switch planes after a maintenance issue was discovered, but her blanket wasn’t moved to the second plane, according to the people familiar with the incident. The Coast Guard pilot was initially fired and told to take a commercial flight home when they reached their destination. They eventually reinstated the pilot because no one else was available to fly them home.” Isn’t it reassuring that the Trump cabinet is filled with self-aggrandizing, incompetent fools just like Noem?
item.dc:creator: SirDrawsALot

item.title: Free Memes for All
item.description:
Deep Space Brooklyn Nine Nine
And I wonder. If everything could ever be this boiled forever. If anything could ever be this mashed again. The only thing I'd ever ask of you... you gotta stick em in a stew when I say when.
It's true.
"Got my nose!" - hummingbirb probably
At least you tri(angl)ed
Also: addiction and sobriety
It's Ronald Reaganondorf's fault.
The callbacks to Star Trek IV were the best part of Picard season 2. Though that's not a high bar.
Superbowl ads have gone downhill, like everything else. But I did like the Dunkin one with the various '90s sitcom people.
And a cross necklace
I expect to have a steady supply of these for the next several always.
The last Dragonborn did a lot of things but I don't think they ever became a literal god.
Flesh and Blood TCG tax.

item.title: Vision Test
item.description: Like most artists on the internet, we're trapped in a cycle of creating content for free while hoping someone eventually notices we're slowly selling off furniture to buy art supplies. If you've enjoyed our comic enough to read to the end of this sentence, consider supporting us on Patreon. You'll get exclusive content featuring characters making even worse life choices than we do: https://www.patreon.com/warandpeas

item.title: We are officially the enemy
item.description: America is Fallen. This is the Rebirth of Fascism: When no amount of impotent bureaucracy or packed courtroom theatre is capable of producing objective justice anymore, when our highest institutions have been infiltrated only to prove that “Constitutionality" and "Rule of Law" are nothing more than hollow buzzwords fit to suit the whims of our Lords, when Men warp reality and openly threaten to usurp our World Order in effort to recreate the world in THEIR own image - there is simply no other recourse than the absolute deposition and dissolution of the current regime and all who aligned themselves with it. America is Fallen, pending the correction of the Grand Historical Injustice that is either Trump or Musk walking free. As far as this citizen is concerned - Elon Musk has forfeited every right he once held in the Free World, arrest him and force any hollow “authority” to attempt to slander the international hero who takes him down for his Treason and global threat. We are dealing with the most hybrid modernization of savagery where this tribe uses the rules of society to dismantle it: Russel Vought, Stephen Miller, they are just as openly terrorists and their pilot project The Heritage Foundation and its alias Project 2025 is to be recognized as a terroristic white supremacist organization and anyone with ties to this group has forfeited the same Freedoms, because i do not recognize the legitimacy of authority of any entity which would align themselves with or breath legitimacy into these forces so Antithetic to the Appropriate Post-WWII attitude. When one tribe holds the fundamental core belief that they are unable to coexist with anyone not of their own tribe, allowing such a group any legitimacy past that point is known as the Fallacy of Tolerance: the singular scenario in which peace is decidedly unachievable, and so be it. Washington is fractured, there is effectively no federal government while everything is shifting around, political factions like trumps are centralizing power, arming and legitimizing loyalist, undermining the constitution, and propping up a terroristic white supremacist organizations vision for a white nation as the center of their agenda. i denounce every traitor who has aligned themself with the trump regime: Those of your tribe will never again find sanctuary in the civilized world - and you have no claim to reap any of the benefits of our civilization which you sought to destroy. May the leaders left of the Free World convene on how to correct the America Problem, while the leaders left within motion to restore our nation as chartered by its Constitution. https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2026/02/open-letter-tech-companies-protect-your-users-lawless-dhs-subpoenas? https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2026/02/open-letter-tech-companies-protect-your-users-lawless-dhs-subpoenas?
